Deadpool (2016)

Parents Guide

Add to guide (Coming Soon)
Showing all 21 items
Jump to:
  • Certification
  • Sex & Nudity (7)
  • Violence & Gore (2)
  • Profanity (3)
  • Alcohol, Drugs & Smoking (3)
  • Frightening & Intense Scenes (4)
  • Spoilers (2)

Certification

Edit
MPAA Rated R for strong violence and language throughout, sexual content and graphic nudity
Certification
  • Argentina:16 (with warning)
  • Australia:MA15+
  • Brazil:16
  • Canada:14A (Alberta/British Columbia/Saskatchewan)
  • Canada:14A (Canadian Home Video)
  • Canada:18A (Manitoba/Ontario)
  • Canada:13+ (Québec)
  • Chile:14
  • China:(Banned)
  • Denmark:15
  • Finland:K-16
  • France:12
  • Germany:16
  • Hong Kong:III
  • Hong Kong:IIB (cut version)
  • Hungary:16
  • India:A
  • Indonesia:D

  • Japan:R15+

  • Mexico:B-15 (with warning)
  • Netherlands:16
  • New Zealand:R16
  • Norway:15
  • Philippines:R-16
  • Poland:16
  • Portugal:M/14
  • Russia:18+

  • Spain:16

  • Turkey:15+

  • United States:R (certificate #49920)

Sex & Nudity

  • There is a sex scene.
    Edit
  • There is a picture of Francis wearing a peniscrown.
    Edit
  • There is a sex scene montage but it's mostly fooling around under covers. A short glimpse of a woman riding a man, hands on breasts are seen but then comes a brief shot of the nipples when she leans forward. A woman wears a strap on and has sex with a man. He screams and tells her to stop.
    Edit
  • A nude man in a medical facility is violently hosed off to disinfect him, he is shown crouching, and then he fights people. However his genitals are obscured by shadows, and the nudity that is shown is non sexual. His penis can be seen when he gets impaled.
    Edit
  • Deadpool is seen clearly masturbating at one point, though nothing is really seen. (apparently, it's something the audience "wasn't supposed to see", according to Deadpool)
    Edit
  • In the club there is many women with their breasts out in the open. About 5 women are seen topless in this scene although the is quite brief and dark. One is seen in full frontal nudity (breasts and vagina). Very Graphic.
    Edit
  • Crude humor throughout the movie.
    Edit
Add an item

Violence & Gore

  • Constant violence with a lot of blood throughout the film. The main character kills many people throughout the film, with both his guns and swords, in a very bloody and graphic fashion. He is shown killing people in ridiculous actions such as chopping people in half. However, all of the violence is in an over-the-top comedic way. The main character's body is severely deformed, however he wears a mask over for most of the film.
    Edit
  • A man is strapped to a gurney, under the assumption he's having his cancer treated. He is given a cylinder of material to bite, injected with a drug, and then tortured over the course of weeks.
    Edit
Add an item

Profanity

  • A character compares Deadpools face to many things. It is a long scene and is played for comedic laughs.
    Edit
  • N*gga is used a few times in a song.
    Edit
  • 84 F-words and its derivatives, Various uses of "shit" and its derivatives, "damn", "ass", and "bitch" are used also. Name-calling (crazy, weird, stupid, idiot, tool, hooker, mutants, douche-pool, douche, ugly mug, fugly mug, ugly cockroach, maggot), exclamations (shut-up, wow), 2 religious profanities (Goddamn), 9 religious exclamations (e.g. Oh My God, Oh God, God, Jesus, Jesus Christ, I Swear to God)
    Edit
Add an item

Alcohol, Drugs & Smoking

  • The main character visits a bar a few times.
    Edit
  • Two references to cocaine, used as jokes.
    Edit
  • A man is injected with a drug that will forcibly give him superpowers by unlocking dormant mutant genes in his DNA.
    Edit
Add an item

Frightening & Intense Scenes

  • Deadpool's face is extremely disfigured, resembling a burn victim. This may be disturbing for some viewers.
    Edit
  • A lot of intense action and violence, but this action is mostly portrayed in a comedic or lighthearted way.
    Edit
  • In a secret government laboratory, several people are shown mutated in various, disturbing ways (such as abnormally-long bones protruding from a man's body, another man covered in boils and hives, etc).
    Edit
  • A man discovers he has terminal cancer after proposing to his girlfriend. He is shown in a severe depression after receiving the news. This can be upsetting and emotionally intense for some.
    Edit
Add an item

Spoilers

The Parents Guide items below may give away important plot points.

Violence & Gore

  • Towards the end of the film, Deadpool kills the main villain by mercilessly shooting him in the head. We see blood splatter everywhere including on the camera, while a mutant standing next to Deadpool, Colossus, vomits in disgust. This is clearly the most violent scene of the film, but it happens quickly and it's mostly done for a comedic effect.
    Edit
Add an item

Frightening & Intense Scenes

  • In one particular scene, a man is tortured over the course of weeks in increasingly more painful/stressful ways to unlock any dormant powers he might have; the torturer, however, visibly enjoys it. These include electrocution, waterboarding, hypothermia and painful drugs. In a final attempt, he is subjected to constant near-asphyxiation over the course of days. This eventually triggers his powers, but disfigures his body immensely in the process as the man screams in agony. Definitely the most disturbing moment in the film.
    Edit
Add an item
